title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Plan A Field Trip
body: Plan A Field Trip       Extend your students learning by using Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area as a classroom. For those teachers that are able to bring their students to Bighorn Canyon for ﬁeld trips, the following information can be used to assist teachers in preparing for their ﬁeld trips. To schedule a field trip call Christy Fleming or Shawn Williams at 307-548-5406. For Fee Waiver information print the below criteria. For further questions, call Christiann Tillman 406-666-3321 Fee Waiver Criteria
